snippet.title: Arctic Awakening - Official Trailer | Future of Play Direct 2023
snippet.description:
Get another look at Arctic Awakening in this latest trailer for the first-person narrative adventure game set in the unforgiving Arctic. Check it out to catch a glimpse at a mysterious event at the end. In Arctic Awakening, Your plane crashed in a storm, leaving only your court-mandated therapy robot for company as you journey to find your co-pilot and uncover the mysteries buried beneath the ice.

#GameTrailers #Gaming
